title: 02/04/21 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 02/04/21 DPS Best OF
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, it was a football packed guest list. We're joined by 2 HOF QBs, a future HOF Defensive Lineman and the co-host of Good Morning Football. Joe Montanan discusses which QB he'd take to start a franchise Troy Aikman explains why he's only half of Tom Brady. Peter Schrager shares why the Rams got rid of Jared Goff. And Aaron Donald talks about his new QB, Matt Stafford

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
